https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nlYGZPSj2VfYkCpXpQuLAn2jCav.jpg Two young men embark on a one night stand. Both with very different understandings of the situation, they struggle to realise the true connection they long for. A contemporary snapshot of where Aussie gay men are on the issue of single-serve love and their desire for more Battlefield
